markdownRemark.html:
I'm getting quite bored of the vast quagmire of user-agent strings. You?

I'd like to propose that an additional header be employed: user-agent-class. I'd like to classify my site visitors into three or four classes:
  • Graphical browsers
  • Text-mode browsers
  • Robots, crawlers, and spiders
  • Miscreants
Anyone want in?
